argument.name: allow_raster|N
argument.description: Optional. Default = all fonts. .T. = include raster fonts .F. = do not include raster fonts

argument.name: reloadFonts
argument.description: Optional. Default = all fonts. An integer number.

page.discussion: The A5.FONT_ENUM() method lists all of the available fonts.
page.example: ? A5.Font_Enum() = Roman Script Modern Marlett Arial Arial CE Arial CYR Arial Greek Arial TUR Arial Baltic Courier New ...
